ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 8 cores x 4 FP32/cycle (NEON 128-bit) x 2 (FMA) x 2 pipes = 128 FP32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp16: 8 cores x 8 FP16/cycle (NEON) x 2 (FMA) x 2 pipes = 256 FP16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 8 cores x 16 INT8/cycle (NEON) x 2 x 2 = 512 INT8 ops/clock

theoretical_peaks_notes: Calculated at boost_clock_mhz (1900 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
l3_cache_bandwidth_notes: System Level Cache (SLC) shared across SoC. Estimated ~75 GB/s based on 8-core scaling.
notes: 8-core ARM Cortex-A78AE cluster with NEON SIMD (128-bit). Part of Jetson Orin NX SoC sharing LPDDR5 memory (102 GB/s) with GPU.
